p: By using the host emergence date as the biofix each year, the numbers of generations per year were estimated to be less (i.e., 8.1 to 10.1 generations per year), compared to the estimated values using the biofix of January 1 st. However, the difference was not significant ( P > 0.05); the small difference appears to have resulted from the lack of degree-days under the low temperatures prevailing at KTFREC during January through April ( Table 4).
